doc:
Joe Palma https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Palma 0 Joe Palma (born Joseph Provenzano; March 17, 1905 – August 14, 1994) was an American film actor. Palma appeared in over 120 films between 1937 and 1968. He was well known as a supporting player for The Three Stooges and his brief tenure as a body double to member Shemp Howard for four shorts produced after Shemp's death, a term later coined as "Fake Shemp". Joe_Palma ( born Joseph_Provenzano ; March_17_,_1905 – August_14_,_1994 ) was an_American_film_actor . Palma appeared in over_120_films between 1937_and_1968 .
